description:
Our team at Wolterman Law Office has represented the interests of clients in Loveland, Ohio, for more than a decade. Even before creating and joining the office, our team members gained professional experience in their respective areas. In fact, our attorneys bring more than 15 years of experience to the table, each. We also have support staff at the ready to handle administrative tasks, so that our attorneys can focus exclusively on legal matters.

We are well-known for our civil case experience. Our team is equipped to handle estate planning, wills, probate, tax law and the following practice areas:

• Real estate: Real estate can be a difficult field to navigate. We provide legal guidance for even the most complex deals, including 1031 exchanges.
• Litigation: We handle civil trial cases between businesses, individuals or a combination of both.
• Business law: Whether you are growing your business or facing legal threats, we are eager to help you navigate this legal minefield.
• Personal injury: We represent injured parties in a wide range of instances, such as medical malpractice, car crashes and wrongful death.

While these do not cover all our practice areas, they give a good idea of the types of cases you can entrust to the Wolterman Law Office. We look forward to serving you.
